alert.note: Alert for Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 9:51PM MST until December 28 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Periods of snow, decreasing late this evening. Areas of blowing and drifting snow. New snow accumulations generally ranging from 1 to 2 inches, with lesser amounts below 5000 feet and locally higher amounts above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 4500 feet near Fredonia, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake and North Rim. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Slippery and snow covered roads could lead to very difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility at times. Additional snow forecast from 9 PM Today to 11 PM Today: Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches Jacob Lake 0 to 1 inches North Rim 1 to 2 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
